definitions.definition: a remark that expresses approval, admiration, or respect:
examples: He complained that his husband never paid him any compliments anymore.

definitions.definition: an action that expresses approval or respect:
examples: You should take it as a compliment when I fall asleep in your company - it means I'm relaxed.

definitions.definition: an expression of your admiration or respect:
examples: That was an excellent meal! My compliments to the chef.

definitions.definition: If you give something to someone with your compliments, you give it to that person free:
examples: We enclose a copy of our latest brochure, with our compliments.

definitions.definition: to praise or express admiration for someone:
examples: I was just complimenting Robert on his wonderful food.
